Educations

  • Bachelor degree
    I was awarded the degree of Bachelor of Computer Science from the Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences, Brawijaya University, Malang, Indonesia, in 2010.
  • Master degree
    I was awarded the degree of Master of Computer Science from the Faculty of Information Technology, Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember, Surabaya, Indonesia, in 2014.
  • Doctoral degree
    I have been a Ph.D. student at the Aritsugi Laboratory, Graduate School of Science and Technology, Kumamoto University, Kumamoto, Japan, since 2019.
